meanings.definition: A person who engages in sabotage.
meanings.sent1: The saboteurs damaged the factory equipment to cause trouble.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the saboteurs who were trying to disrupt the event.
meanings.sent3: The saboteurs thought it would be funny to switch the sugar with salt in the break room.
meanings.sent4: The saboteurs were like silent ninjas, sneaking in and causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The image of the saboteurs in black masks stayed in my mind, creating fear.

meanings.sent1: We heard that the saboteurs were planning another attack.
meanings.sent2: The saboteurs were caught red-handed trying to cut the power supply.
meanings.sent3: The saboteurs gathered in the dark alley, looking mischievous.
meanings.sent4: The group of saboteurs seemed to blend into the shadows, unseen.
meanings.sent5: The word 'saboteurs' echoed in the empty room, sending shivers down my spine.
